label: 院評定衆
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
見出し読み: いんのひょうじょうしゅう
見出し読み_mod: いんのひょうじょうしゅう
説明文: A judicial body established for the Imperial Court in 1246, at the behest of the Bakufu; never entirely free of Kamakura influence, it did perform as expected. Its purview was mostly proprietor-level suits, boundary disputes, and non-gokenin lawlessness.　[御家人]
